title: Lippy Lipbalm
description: Nourishing lipbalm that moisturizes your lips and protects them from pollution.
instructions: Apply a small amount on your lips whenever they feel dry.

title: Glow Sunscreen SPF 30
description: Sunscreen SPF 30 with a smell of coconut that protects your skin from sunburn.
instructions: Put a small amount in your hand and rub onto your skin before going out, reapply after swimming or exercising.

title: Smooth Silky Shampoo
description: Gentle shampoo that cleanses and nourishes your hair, leaving it silky and smooth.
instructions: Apply to wet hair, lather, and rinse thoroughly. Repeat if necessary.

title: Fresh Face Cleanser
description: Refreshing facial cleanser that removes impurities and leaves your skin feeling clean and rejuvenated.
instructions: Apply a small amount to damp skin, massage gently, and rinse off with warm water.

title: Hydrate Me Moisturizer
description: Lightweight moisturizer that hydrates your skin and keeps it soft and supple all day.
instructions: Apply to clean skin in the morning and evening for best results.

title: Revive Eye Cream
description: Soothing eye cream that reduces puffiness and dark circles, giving you a refreshed look.
instructions: Gently pat a small amount around the eye area morning and night.

title: Radiant Glow Serum
description: Brightening serum that evens out skin tone and enhances your natural glow.
instructions: Apply a few drops to clean skin before moisturizer.

title: Volume Boost Mascara
description: Volumizing mascara that gives your lashes a fuller, more dramatic look.
instructions: Apply from the base to the tip of your lashes. Layer for added volume.

title: Silky Smooth Conditioner
description: Moisturizing conditioner that leaves your hair soft and tangle-free.
instructions: Apply to wet hair after shampooing, leave for 2-3 minutes, then rinse.

title: Berry Bliss Lip Gloss
description: Shiny lip gloss with a hint of berry color and a delicious scent.
instructions: Apply to lips as needed for a glossy finish.

title: Nourishing Night Cream
description: Rich night cream that deeply nourishes your skin while you sleep.
instructions: Apply to clean skin before bed.

title: Cool Mint Foot Cream
description: Refreshing foot cream that soothes and revitalizes tired feet.
instructions: Massage a small amount into feet, especially after a long day.

title: Sunset Blush
description: Natural-looking blush that gives your cheeks a sun-kissed glow.
instructions: Apply to the apples of your cheeks and blend outwards.

title: Deep Clean Scrub
description: Exfoliating scrub that removes dead skin cells and unclogs pores.
instructions: Use 2-3 times a week on damp skin, massage gently, and rinse.

title: Lavender Body Lotion
description: Calming body lotion that hydrates your skin and relaxes your senses.
instructions: Apply all over your body after showering.

title: Ultra Matte Foundation
description: Full-coverage matte foundation that controls shine and lasts all day.
instructions: Apply evenly to your face with a sponge or brush.

title: Citrus Burst Body Wash
description: Energizing body wash with a refreshing citrus scent.
instructions: Apply to wet skin, lather, and rinse thoroughly.

title: Repair & Restore Hair Mask
description: Intensive hair mask that repairs damaged hair and restores its health.
instructions: Apply to clean, damp hair, leave for 5-10 minutes, then rinse.

title: Brightening Face Mask
description: Face mask that brightens and revitalizes dull skin.
instructions: Apply a thin layer to clean skin, leave for 15 minutes, then rinse.

title: Refreshing Face Mist
description: Hydrating face mist that refreshes and revitalizes your skin.
instructions: Spray on your face whenever you need a quick refresh.

title: Silky Smooth Hand Cream
description: Rich hand cream that hydrates and softens dry hands.
instructions: Apply a small amount to hands and massage until absorbed.

title: Minty Fresh Toothpaste
description: Refreshing toothpaste that whitens teeth and freshens breath.
instructions: Brush your teeth thoroughly twice a day.

title: Gentle Baby Lotion
description: Gentle lotion for baby skin, keeps it soft and hydrated.
instructions: Apply to babyâ€™s skin after bath.

title: Tropical Shower Gel
description: Invigorating shower gel with a tropical fragrance that energizes your senses.
instructions: Apply to wet skin, lather, and rinse.

title: Smooth Shave Cream
description: Rich shave cream that ensures a smooth, irritation-free shave.
instructions: Apply a thin layer to wet skin before shaving.

title: Natural Deodorant
description: Aluminum-free deodorant that keeps you fresh all day.
instructions: Apply to underarms as needed.

title: Calming Face Oil
description: Nourishing face oil that calms and hydrates your skin.
instructions: Apply a few drops to clean skin, massage gently.

title: Pure Aloe Vera Gel
description: Soothing aloe vera gel for all skin types, helps with sunburn and irritation.

title: Cocoa Butter Body Butter
description: Rich body butter that deeply moisturizes and nourishes dry skin.

title: Matte Liquid Lipstick
description: Long-lasting matte liquid lipstick with intense color payoff.

title: Peppermint Foot Scrub
description: Exfoliating foot scrub that refreshes and revitalizes tired feet.
instructions: Massage into feet, focusing on rough areas, then rinse.

title: Frizz Control Hair Serum
description: Anti-frizz hair serum that tames flyaways and adds shine.

title: Vitamin E Face Cream
description: Moisturizing face cream enriched with vitamin E for healthy skin.

title: Rose Water Toner
description: Hydrating toner with rose water that soothes and balances skin.
instructions: Apply to a cotton pad and sweep over face after cleansing.

title: Charcoal Peel-Off Mask
description: Detoxifying charcoal mask that removes impurities and blackheads.
instructions: Apply a thin layer to clean skin, let dry, then peel off.

title: Berry Bliss Body Scrub
description: Exfoliating body scrub with a delightful berry scent.
instructions: Massage onto wet skin, then rinse.

title: Cucumber Eye Gel
description: Cooling eye gel that reduces puffiness and refreshes tired eyes.

title: Anti-Aging Serum
description: Powerful anti-aging serum that reduces the appearance of fine lines.

title: Coconut Hair Oil
description: Nourishing hair oil that strengthens and adds shine to your hair.

title: Acne Spot Treatment
description: Targeted treatment that reduces acne and blemishes quickly.

title: Green Tea Face Mask
description: Rejuvenating face mask with green tea extract for refreshed skin.
instructions: Apply a thin layer to clean skin, leave for 15 minutes, then rinse.

title: Detangling Hair Spray
description: Lightweight spray that detangles hair and adds shine.

title: Ginger & Lemon Body Wash
description: Invigorating body wash with a refreshing ginger and lemon scent.

title: Moisturizing Hand Sanitizer
description: Hand sanitizer that kills germs while moisturizing your skin.

title: Brightening Eye Serum
description: Eye serum that brightens and reduces the appearance of dark circles.

title: Softening Lip Scrub
description: Gentle lip scrub that exfoliates and softens your lips.

title: Calming Chamomile Toner
description: Gentle toner with chamomile that soothes and balances sensitive skin.
instructions: Apply to a cotton pad and sweep over face after cleansing.

title: Silk Protein Shampoo
description: Shampoo with silk proteins that strengthens and adds shine to your hair.
instructions: Apply to wet hair, lather, and rinse thoroughly. Repeat if necessary.

title: Shea Butter Hand Cream
description: Ultra-rich hand cream with shea butter for deep hydration.
instructions: Apply a small amount to hands and massage until absorbed.

title: Tea Tree Oil Cleanser
description: Purifying cleanser with tea tree oil for clear, blemish-free skin.

title: Rose Petal Bath Bombs

description: Lightweight hair mist that hydrates and refreshes your hair.
